messages.subject: Video games and math
messages.msgSnippet: Alex just told me that if he plays 100  versus games on Super Smash Bros, he gets a hidden character.  He says it took him about 5 minutes to play ten versus
messages.messageBody:
Alex just told me that if he plays 100 versus games on Super Smash Bros,
he gets a hidden character. He says it took him about 5 minutes to play ten
versus matches, so he figures it'll take him less than an hour.

He's keeping track of how many matches he's played, by occasionally
adding the number of lost matches, and won matches. He says he's won most of them,
so it's really easy to add them up, but that he's going to finish all 100.
He said he hopes he wins a good 90% of them. I didn't know he knew what
percentages were.

Multiplication, adding, and percentages, from a video game.

~Aimee
